oai_dc:dc.dc:title: [Letter to William Lloyd Garrison]
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Douglass, Frederick, 1818-1895.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Frederick Douglass compares his reception in Europe with that of the United States. He tells about his visit to Eton Hall.
First page of letter is missing. For the complete letter, see The Liberator, January 30, 1846.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Garrison, William Lloyd, 1805-1879 -- Correspondence.
Douglass, Frederick, 1818-1895 -- Correspondence.
